title: Ticket #866: The presence of VOMS attributes makes GSI very slow, even if not used.
description:
Even if VOMS attributes are not used for anything, they are always extracted and this is a very slow process.

Suggestion: add a USE_VOMS_ATTRIBUTES config parameter. defaults to true, but allows people to disable VOMS if desired.
remarks:
suggestion implemented. resolving.

2009-Oct-17 07:12:06 by matt:
Why do you use both param_boolean and param_boolean_int?

2009-Oct-17 11:05:21 by zmiller:
i initially used param_boolean everywhere, since that's what i was paraming for, but since globus_utils.c is C and not C++, i needed to switch those call sites to param_boolean_int.

2009-Oct-17 12:36:19 by matt:
Aww, total pain. We really should get rid of the language split.
